name: MAPMAN
description:
This game is a re-interpretation of the famous PACMAN game. You play as an adventurer who is greedy for gold and diamonds. However, specters protect the treasure. You will have to explore the whole map by lighting the torches to be able to collect a maximum of points. But be careful, you only have 3 lives.

The game was made on Unity.

The graphics were made on Krita.

The music was composed on Fl Studio.

This project was carried out as part of the course 8INF960 - Principles of video game design/development at UQAC in the fall of 2021.
